Introduction
This topic contains information on distinguishing between degenerative and post-traumatic arthritis, including
determining the type of arthritis
handling unclear etiology of arthritis
, and
example of
post-traumatic arthritis
, and
handling unclear etiology for an arthritis diagnosis
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C - Arthritis
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
